geninfo.para: Use the following procedure to assure proper refilling and air purging of the cooling system.

svcproc.title: Cooling System Refilling Procedure

step1.para: Open the petcock on top of the engine thermostat housing.
Fill the cooling system with Texaco ELC (Extended Life Coolant) or equivalent until coolant flows from the petcock.
Close the petcock and continue filling until the coolant reaches the proper fill level on the coolant reservoir.
Start and operate engine until it reaches normal operating temperature.
Observe coolant reservoir for proper coolant level and adjust as needed.

warning.para: To avoid personal injury, use only the following procedure to remove the pressure type cap from the coolant reservoir. Always allow the engine to cool first. Wrap a thick, heavy cloth around the cap. Loosen the cap slowly, then pause for a moment to allow any pressure to escape. This will avoid possible scalding by hot water or steam. Continue to unscrew cap and remove only after pressure in cooling system is fully released.

svcproc.para: This procedure will be included in the next revision of the Operators Manual.
